701749f-a.title: Bronx: St. Peter's Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
701749f-a.text:
St. Peters Avenue, at the SS. W. corner of E. Tremont
Avenue (tracks thereon), showing old frame houses.
June 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
701749f-a.folder: St. Peter's Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

700940f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - St. Peter's Avenue
700940f-a.text:
E. Tremont Avenue, east from St. Peters Avenue. The
3-story house (left) is at Lurting Avenue.
June 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
700940f-a.folder: Tremont Avenue (East & St. Peter's Avenue, Bronx, NY

701284f-a.title: Bronx: Hone Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
701284f-a.text:
Hone Ave., north from but not including East Tremont Ave., to the
tracks of the New York, New Haven and Hartford Railroad, showing the
walk-bridge spanning the tracks.
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701284f-a.folder: Hone Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

701760f-a.title: Bronx: Seddon Street - Tremont Avenue (East)
701760f-a.text:
Seddon Street, adjoining the S. E. corner of E. Tremont
Avenue, showing an ancient frame house, still used as s
residence at thus date.
June 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTI0YS
701760f-a.folder: Seddon Street & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

700938f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Seddon Street
700938f-a.text:
E. Tremont Avenue, at the S. E. corner of Seddon
Street, showing an old frame dwelling.
June 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
700938f-a.folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Seddon Street, Bronx, NY

701748f-b.title: Bronx: St. Peter's Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
701748f-b.text:
(1)
St. Peters Ave. (foreground), at the S.W. corner of East Tremont
Ave. (right).
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a point slightly south of the corner. Note the
1A -story old frame dwelling.
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
